title: Cannot shut down geth
body:
#### System information

Geth version: 1.5.4-stable
OS & Version: Linux
HDD hard drive 

#### Expected behaviour
Geth shuts down

#### Actual behaviour
Hangs up, still uses 1,1 GiB of memory, GPU 0%, HDD 0%

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
run geth --cache=1024
ctrl-c or kill -2

#### Backtrace

```
I1202 10:42:23.782074 core/blockchain.go:1047] imported 3 blocks,    32 txs (  2.500 Mg) in   14.237s ( 0.176 Mg/s). #2317881 [67114f73… / b54fa85d…]
I1202 10:42:40.930571 core/blockchain.go:1047] imported 4 blocks,    30 txs (  2.476 Mg) in   17.148s ( 0.144 Mg/s). #2317885 [b54fa85d… / 9fb3a8c0…]
I1202 10:42:50.605166 core/blockchain.go:1047] imported 14 blocks,   216 txs (  5.195 Mg) in    9.674s ( 0.537 Mg/s). #2317899 [9fb3a8c0… / 6c530099…]
I1202 10:44:16.608301 core/blockchain.go:1047] imported 1 blocks,    44 txs (  1.011 Mg) in 1m26.003s ( 0.012 Mg/s). #2317900 [ad4fae9f…]
I1202 10:45:54.815763 core/blockchain.go:1047] imported 11 blocks,    60 txs (  2.367 Mg) in 1m38.207s ( 0.024 Mg/s). #2317911 [ad4fae9f… / 3d7262c1…]
I1202 10:46:05.615058 core/blockchain.go:1047] imported 5 blocks,    16 txs (  2.160 Mg) in   10.799s ( 0.200 Mg/s). #2317916 [3d7262c1… / 7c4a2e9f…]
^CI1202 10:46:16.704166 cmd/utils/cmd.go:81] Got interrupt, shutting down...
I1202 10:46:17.113915 node/node.go:373] IPC endpoint closed: /home/petr/.ethereum/geth.ipc
I1202 10:47:16.313115 core/blockchain.go:1047] imported 7 blocks,    81 txs (  2.835 Mg) in 1m10.698s ( 0.040 Mg/s). #2317923 [7c4a2e9f… / cd20d97d…]
I1202 10:47:16.355822 core/blockchain.go:592] Chain manager stopped
I1202 10:47:16.355868 eth/handler.go:228] Stopping ethereum protocol handler...
I1202 10:47:16.832596 eth/downloader/downloader.go:305] Synchronisation failed: block body download canceled (requested)
I1202 10:47:16.839626 eth/handler.go:249] Ethereum protocol handler stopped
I1202 10:47:16.911496 core/tx_pool.go:195] Transaction pool stopped
I1202 10:47:17.111987 eth/backend.go:519] Automatic pregeneration of ethash DAG OFF (ethash dir: /home/petr/.ethash)
I1202 10:47:17.787797 ethdb/database.go:176] closed db:/home/petr/.ethereum/geth/chaindata
^CI1202 10:58:45.345483 cmd/utils/cmd.go:86] Already shutting down, interrupt 9 more times for panic.
I1202 11:21:46.548930 cmd/utils/cmd.go:86] Already shutting down, interrupt 8 more times for panic.
```

Is it safe now to kill the process? Thank you.
Please continue hitting ctrl-c until it panics and post the output here. Thank you!

Done:

